810480.name: Fantasy Grounds - Hellfrost: Atlas of the Frozen North (Savage Worlds)
810480.description:
Hellfrost Atlas of the Frozen North

A LAND REVEALED!
The realm of Rassilon, located immediately below the Hellfrost, is an ancient land; one scarred by war, weather, and time. Over countless millennia it has hidden its many secrets from view.
Pieced together from ancient scrolls and fragments of tomes written long ago by learned scholars and cartographers, it is now time to unlock these secrets and discover the realm of Rassilon in all its majesty!
Within this book youll find:
  • Expanded descriptions on 49 regions, as well as the mystical lands of Alfheim, the turbulent Ten Seas, and the subterranean deeps of Erthas Realm.
  • Hundreds of locations to explore.
  • Rules for creating sacred places, with detailed examples.
  • Three new organizations suitable for player characters.
  • Glorious full color maps, showing the continent and major cities in never-seen-before detail.
Requires the Hellfrost: Gazetteer
Requires the Hellfrost Players Guide
Author: Paul Wiggy Wade-Williams
Cartography: Robin Elliott
Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Kevin Doswell
Requirements: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Kevin Doswell
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
